synopsis.p: Maps names and synonyms of terms defined in OBO files.

description.p: maps names and synonyms of terms described in oboFiles on target.

param-doc.name: keepDBXref
param-doc.p: Either to store term dbxrefs. Dbxrefs are stored in features that match the database name.

param-doc.name: oboFiles
param-doc.p: Paths to the OBO files to map.

param-doc.name: idFeature
param-doc.p: Name of the feature where to store the term id.

param-doc.name: versionFeature
param-doc.p: Name of the feature where to store the ontology version.

param-doc.name: idKeys
param-doc.p: Map the term keys instead of name and synonyms

param-doc.name: nameFeature
param-doc.p: Name of the feature where to store the term name.

param-doc.name: pathFeature
param-doc.p: Name of the feature where to store the term id path from the root.

param-doc.name: ancestorsFeature
param-doc.p: Name of the feature where to store the term ancestors ids.

param-doc.name: childrenFeature
param-doc.p: Name of the feature where to store the term children ids.

param-doc.name: synonymsFeature
param-doc.p: Name of the feature where to store the term synonyms.

param-doc.name: parentsFeature
param-doc.p: Name of the feature where to store the term parents ids.
